Package com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem

Interface ActionToolbar

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionToolbarImpl

    public interface ActionToolbar
    Represents a toolbar with a visual presentation.
    See Also:
    ActionManager.createActionToolbar(String, ActionGroup, boolean)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ActionToolbar.LayoutPolicy 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ACTION_TOOLBAR_PROPERTY_KEY 
      static int AUTO_LAYOUT_POLICY
      This is experimental layout policy which allow toolbar auto-hide and show buttons that don't fit into actual side
      static java.awt.Dimension DEFAULT_MINIMUM_BUTTON_SIZE
      This is default minimum size of the toolbar button
      static java.awt.Dimension NAVBAR_MINIMUM_BUTTON_SIZE 
      static int NOWRAP_LAYOUT_POLICY
      This is default layout policy for the toolbar.
      static int WRAP_LAYOUT_POLICY
      This is experimental layout policy which allow toolbar to wrap components in multiple rows.

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_TOOLBAR_PROPERTY_KEY

        static final java.lang.String ACTION_TOOLBAR_PROPERTY_KEY
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NOWRAP_LAYOUT_POLICY

        static final int NOWRAP_LAYOUT_POLICY
        This is default layout policy for the toolbar. It defines that all toolbar component are in one row / column and they are not wrapped when toolbar is small
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WRAP_LAYOUT_POLICY

        static final int WRAP_LAYOUT_POLICY
        This is experimental layout policy which allow toolbar to wrap components in multiple rows.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AUTO_LAYOUT_POLICY

        static final int AUTO_LAYOUT_POLICY
        This is experimental layout policy which allow toolbar auto-hide and show buttons that don't fit into actual side
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_MINIMUM_BUTTON_SIZE

        static final java.awt.Dimension DEFAULT_MINIMUM_BUTTON_SIZE
        This is default minimum size of the toolbar button

      • NAVBAR_MINIMUM_BUTTON_SIZE

        static final java.awt.Dimension NAVBAR_MINIMUM_BUTTON_SIZE

    • Method Detail

      • getComponent

        javax.swing.JComponent getComponent()
        Returns:
        component which represents the tool bar on UI

      • getLayoutPolicy

        int getLayoutPolicy()
        Returns:
        current layout policy
        See Also:
        NOWRAP_LAYOUT_POLICY, WRAP_LAYOUT_POLICY

      • setLayoutPolicy

        void setLayoutPolicy(int layoutPolicy)
        Sets new component layout policy. Method accepts WRAP_LAYOUT_POLICY and NOWRAP_LAYOUT_POLICY values.

      • adjustTheSameSize

        void adjustTheSameSize(boolean value)
        If the value is true then the all button on toolbar are the same size. It very useful when you create "Outlook" like toolbar. Currently this method can be considered as hot fix.

      • setMinimumButtonSize

        void setMinimumButtonSize(java.awt.Dimension size)
        Sets minimum size of toolbar button. By default all buttons at toolbar has 25x25 pixels size.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if size is null

      • setOrientation

        void setOrientation(int orientation)
        Sets toolbar orientation
        See Also:
        SwingConstants.HORIZONTAL, SwingConstants.VERTICAL

      • getMaxButtonHeight

        int getMaxButtonHeight()
        Returns:
        maximum button height

      • updateActionsImmediately

        void updateActionsImmediately()
        Forces update of the all actions in the toolbars. Actions, however, normally updated automatically every 500 ms.

      • hasVisibleActions

        boolean hasVisibleActions()

      • setTargetComponent

        void setTargetComponent(javax.swing.JComponent component)
        Will be used for data-context retrieval.

      • setReservePlaceAutoPopupIcon

        void setReservePlaceAutoPopupIcon(boolean reserve)

      • setSecondaryActionsTooltip

        void setSecondaryActionsTooltip(java.lang.String secondaryActionsTooltip)

      • setSecondaryActionsIcon

        void setSecondaryActionsIcon(javax.swing.Icon icon)

      • setSecondaryActionsIcon

        void setSecondaryActionsIcon(javax.swing.Icon icon,
                             boolean hideDropdownIcon)

      • getActions

        java.util.List<AnAction> getActions()

      • setMiniMode

        void setMiniMode(boolean minimalMode)

      • getToolbarDataContext

        DataContext getToolbarDataContext()

      • setShowSeparatorTitles

        default void setShowSeparatorTitles(boolean showSeparatorTitles)
        Enables showing titles of separators as labels in the toolbar (off by default).
